summary.body: Has anyone used a minicab to get to Heathrow, and do they have any recommendations? There's too much luggage to take on public transport, and a minicab would be cheaper than a black cab, but I'm worried a minicab will get lost around the Barbican unless they're local. Thanks
summary.subject: Cab to Heathrow

summary.body: Does anyone have the number of a reputable cab firm? I need to get to Heathrow airport tomorrow pm and, given the gravity of the situation, I don't think public transport will get me there. Thanks.
summary.subject: Taxi

summary.body: Attending wedding in the city  - I may need to arrange a few cars just in case some guests can't / don't won't to / walk a few hundred yards between venues. (don't know till the day if or how many required.) Anyone have a recommendation for a particular cab company for such a requirement? best rgds,
summary.subject: Cab Companies - Fairly Smart Cars

summary.body: Having given up the car, does anyone know of any safe and reliable minicab firms, especially for use by my girlfriend and 7 year old daughter
summary.subject: Safe Reliable Minicabs
